A

ActionStrategy - Interface in hotciv.framework
 
add(Figure) - Method in class hotciv.view.CivDrawing
The UnitDrawing should not allow client side units to add and manipulate figures; only figures that renders game objects are relevant, and these should be handled by observer events from the game instance.
